name: Creatures (itch) (gabethf)
description:
Controls: 'r' to restore health of all party members when out of combat. 'SPACE' when near trainer to battle. Walk in grass or wild pokemon battle.

I do not own any of the art or music used in this project. It is simply a rework of the battling system found in Pokemon, and an attempt by myself to recreate a portion of the games.
